ygData.subject: Building heritrix 1.10.x
ygData.msgSnippet: Maven 1.0.2 was refusing to build  heritrix 1.10.0 for me.  There was a problem  downloading dependencies. The workaround can be found at

Maven 1.0.2 was refusing to build  heritrix 1.10.0 
for me.  There was a pr=
oblem  downloading dependencies.  
The workaround can be found at
http://ma=
ven.apache.org/maven-1.x/news.html.

You need to add this line to the proje=
ct.properties
file that you have in the heritrix-1.10.0/ directory:

maven.=
repo.remote=3Dhttp://repo1.maven.org/maven

That fix worked for me and heri=
trix 1.10.0 built.

Maybe the IA folks would like to add this line 
(tempor=
arily, I'm sure) to their project.properties
file.

D. Bergmark
